abstract: In the latest twists in the Dow Jones saga, the company said on Wednesday that its board of directors has taken the lead in negotiating with Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation. The move may push the publisher of The Wall Street Journal closer and faster to a sale.
lead_paragraph: In the latest twists in the Dow Jones saga, the company said on Wednesday that its board of directors has taken the lead in negotiating with Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation. The move may push the publisher of The Wall Street Journal closer and faster to a sale.

headline.main: Dow Jones’ Board Takes Lead in News Corp. Talks
